summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Seattle Transportation; authorizing the Director of Transportation to execute a grant agreement with the Washington State Interagency Committee for Outdoor Recreation for Washington Wildlife and Recreation Program funds for the acquisition of right-of-way for the Ship Canal Trail Project; authorizing the acceptance and deposit of the grant funds to be received; authorizing negotiations for portions of the Burlington Northern Sante Fe Railroad Company right-of-way located on the South Side of the Ship Canal between Eighth Avenue West and West Emerson Street; and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Transportation Fund to purchase the right-of-way.
